description: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM is a technical drawing application for Windows and macOS. Amateur and professional users may utilize the software to diagram various processes, from sports positions on a playing field to the complexities of a 100-person organization. The CDTX
NOTE: ConceptDraw Pro uses "x" at the end of the file extension, e.g., .CDX for .CDD , to signify the XML version.
